steps.nodeStepDescription:
Standard sight.
A lightweight design, good for recoil control.

Snapshot sight. 
Excellent handling.
Superb target acquisition.

Agile sight. 
Lightning-fast handling.
Radar stays active while aiming down this weapon's sights.
Reloading this weapon after a kill grants a damage bonus for a short time.
This weapon gains better target acquisition.
One random bullet in the magazine causes considerable bonus damage.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Kills with this weapon grant enhanced motion tracker resolution for a short time.
Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.
Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.
Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
Improved range and accuracy.

Increased Range and Stability 
Slower Reload, Reduced Magazine Size

Increased Range 
Reduced Stability

Increased Range 
Slower Reload
Volatile payload explodes on impact, dealing a portion of the weapon's damage in an area.

Increased Magazine Size 
Reduced Stability

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.
When held, this weapon grants +2 character Agility.

Stable sight. 
Optimized for excellent recoil control.

Flexible sight. 
Light, with good recoil control.
Strong target acquisition.
This weapon causes kinetic damage.
Consume a more powerful Weapon to boost the Attack value of this Weapon.
Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.
Chance to refill this weapon's magazine when critically wounded.
This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.
Improved accuracy while airborne.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
